thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 32 of 588
thread.title: Nell

author: Nell
title: Nell
text: I love fable tics because its affordable, has quality products, and fits a variety of shapes and sizes. I like buying from a company that offers clothes at reasonable prices especially workout clothes because there is so much wear and tear on them. However, I have not had an issue with my Fabletics clothing breaking, tearing or busting anywhere and I wear them AT LEAST four times a week if not more. Lastly, their clothes, especially pants in my opinion, fit all women in any size. My friends and I love Fabletics and we range from a size XS petite to a curvy L and XL. Fabletics truly fits all body types and they advertise that and are 100% true to it. I have no reservations ordering from this company.
